panels.description:
Preferred way to view memory usage, Portainer also uses this method compared to showing RSS memory usage.

**NOTE**: This graph joins all containers with the same name together sometimes causing visible memory usage spikes (on the graph) when recreating containers. Toggle the `Split Containers` query in the panel editing UI to change this behavior.
panels.title: Memory usage per container

panels.description: **NOTE**: This graph joins all containers with the same name together sometimes causing visible memory usage spikes (on the graph) when recreating containers. Toggle the `Split Containers` query in the panel editing UI to change this behavior.
